attributes.action: Bring in a law to stop job redundancy during the job retention scheme.
attributes.additional_details: Because thousands of people have already loss their Jobs. And company are still making more. During this time they should be forced to make use of the government job retention scheme instead of letting people go.
attributes.background:
I would like both the government and parliament to pass a law. To make all firms stop using co-vid 19 as reason to make redundancy and as long as government job retention scheme is in place it
Should be illegal to make redundancy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305475
